readability_reflection: I found interpolation more readable. I was easier and quicker for my brain to understand the logic behind it.
comprehension_debugging: I found it harder when concatenation was used because it was an entirely new concept to me.
preference_rationale: I would use interpolation as I am more familiar with it.
learning_curve: I was quicker with the one I was more familiar with.
suggestions_improvement: I do not think there is any way you can change the syntax to enhance readability.
